title: I LOVE LISTS
description: I LOVE LISTS  Raise your hand if you love cat bellies.  The most solitary beaches in the world, according to Reddit. I love how this house has a Mad Men vibe. Pomodoro 2.0 – an update to the timing method! Photos of Jupiter are mind-blowing. What are some of the best Martha Stewart hacks?  New items at Trader Joe’s this month.  I forgot about Lifesaver holes. I love this stained glass series.  The fascinating evolution of watches.  Let’s daydream about going to a wellness resort. Sling bags: one / two / three I’ve never made a poke cake. I probably should. What’s the best frozen pie crust?  Look what you can pet at the PDX airport! I always like perusing Oprah’s favorite things list.  Here are some of my favorite things!  Check out this mainframe computer from 1953. Wow.  Need a sweet treat? Try Pumpkin Pudding Cake Weekend reading: Be Ready When the Luck Happens      The Currently Workbook is up in my shop! If it sells out from my Etsy shop, you can always find one on Blurb (they’ll ship internationally if you’re abroad!) You can also download a pdf version here.  Thanks so much for supporting me in this art practice. You can read more about it on my Substack!  The post I LOVE LISTS appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: Welcome to I LOVE LISTS. It's Friday and Tracy of Shutterbean.com shares her finds from the internet on a weekly list called I LOVE LISTS!
